trans-unit.source: Terminates the running workflow instance, raises the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed*> event in the host, and reports error information.
trans-unit.target: Termina a instância de fluxo de trabalho em execução, gera o <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed*>eventos no anfitrião e informações de erro de relatórios.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed*>

trans-unit.source: Once the workflow is terminated, it cannot be resumed.
trans-unit.target: Depois do fluxo de trabalho foi terminado, não é possível retomá-lo.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the exception that provoked the instance termination.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a exceção que provoked a terminação de instância.

trans-unit.source: The exception that is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A> is a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> if only <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> is set.
trans-unit.target: A exceção que é transmitida ao <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>é um <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>se apenas <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>está definido.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If only Exception is set, that exception is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se apenas a exceção é definida, que exceção é passada para <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> and Exception are set, a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is passed with the specified <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>, and Exception is set as the exception’s <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se ambos os <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>e exceção são configuradas, um <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>é passada com especificado <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>, e exceção é definida como a exceção <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>

trans-unit.source: If neither is set, a default <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is created.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum dos dois estiver definido, uma predefinição <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>é criado.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>

trans-unit.source: A string input argument with the reason for the workflow instance termination.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de entrada do argumento com o motivo para a terminação de instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The exception that is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A> is a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> if only Reason is set.
trans-unit.target: A exceção que é transmitida ao <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>é um <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>se apenas a razão está definida.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If only <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> is set, that exception is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se apenas <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>estiver definido, que a exceção é passada para <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both Reason and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> are set, a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is passed with the specified Reason, and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> is set as the exception’s <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se ambos pelo motivo e <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>estiver definida, uma <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>seja passado com o motivo especificado, e <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>está definido como a exceção <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: If neither is set, a default <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is created.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum dos dois estiver definido, uma predefinição <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>é criado.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>
O motivo para a terminação de fluxo de trabalho.
